name: Blob Escape
description:
Blob is trying to escape from an evil factory.

A and D to strafe from left or right. W and SPACE to jump. Hit all the buttons in the factory to escape!

Credits to: 

Games Director: Shueb Islam

Visual Artists: Libby Macdonald and Partick Arias 

Programmer: Redwan

Sound Designer: Chika Alan Robinson
